articles.title: 'Triangle of Sadness' actor, model Charlbi Dean dead at 32 - CBC News
articles.description: Charlbi Dean, the South African actor and model who had a breakout role in Triangle of Sadness, has died at age 32. The prize-winning film's North American premiere is set to take place at this year's Toronto International Film Festival.
articles.content:
Charlbi Dean, the South African actor and model who had a breakout role in Triangle of Sadness, which won this year's top prize at the Cannes Film Festival, has died at age 32.
Dean died Monday at a… [+1424 chars]
